For infection, 10-day-old plants were spray-inoculated to saturation with a spore suspension of 40,000 spores/ml (strain Emwa1)
Seeds from A. thaliana ecotype Wassilewskija (WS) were sown on a soil/sand mixture, stratified for 3 days at 4 째C, and then grown under a 12 h photoperiod in a growth chamber at 20 째C.

In two independent experiments, cotyledons from the ecotype Wassilewskija (Ws-4) wild-type or pskr1-5 mutant plants were treated with water, or inoculated with H. arabidopsidis to establish a compatible interaction. Total RNA was extracted from about 100 mg of these tissues according to a procedure described (Laroche-Raynal et al., Plant Science Letters 35, 139-146,1984).
A. thaliana seeds were sown on a soil/sand mixture, stratified for 3 days at 4 째C, and then grown under a 12 h photoperiod in a growth chamber at 20 째C.

In two independent experiments for each line, cotyledons were treated with water, or inoculated with Hpa to establish a compatible interaction. Total RNA was extracted from about 100 mg of these tissues according to a procedure described (Laroche-Raynal et al., Plant Science Letters 35, 139-146,1984).
